name: Atelier Lydie & Suelle: The Alchemists and the Mysterious Paintings DX
overview: The 3rd instalment, "Atelier Lydie & Suelle", is back in DX form! The Mysterious series combines heart-warming everyday elements with extraordinary experiences in a world full of wonders. Hone your alchemy skills by exploring the mysterious worlds inside paintings and collecting ingredients through exploring and defeating monsters. Aim to become the best atelier in the kingdom by completing many requests and tasks and raising your atelier rank. DX Features: • A new painting based on the world of “Nelke & the Legendary Alchemists: Ateliers of the New World”, featuring new story episodes and a new boss enemy! • New “Nelke’s world” painting fragments scattered around various painting worlds • 'Fast Forward' feature for fast-paced battles • Lots of previously released DLC • Photo mode to enjoy capturing beautiful images The Story: Twin sisters Lydie and Suelle are two novice alchemists. One day, after discovering a mysterious painting, they get closer to turning their dream of running the best atelier in the kingdom into reality.
